[[size xx-large]]SCP-5001 Art Piece Wallpaper [[/size]]

----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=false
|width=100%
|url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/ananomalouswriter/SCP%205001%20Desktop%20With%20Text.jpg
|add-caption=true
|caption=SCP-5001
]]
 _
This is the very first entry into my specialized Art Piece Wallpaper series. [[footnote]]Though only now made a standalone page[[/footnote]] I started off this particular style of wallpapers as I wanted to make something different than my usual neon style. The thought came in when I reviewed a frame of SCP-5001 in my [[[https://youtu.be/o1GfJ_PxZC4| SCPMAD]]], and thought that it looked like a cool scene as it depicted the bombastic climax of the article. Plus as geometric shapes are my current forte, SCP-5001 was the perfect first candidate with its more or less circle shape. 

> Read the original article for the full experience: [[footnote]]Do it now.[[/footnote]]
> SCP-5001 â€” Sacrosanct
> Written by:  YossiPossi
> Link: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5001

Animated Live Wallpaper [[[https://youtu.be/X74bNV2lq6g | HERE]]]
